ggsegHO 2.0.0

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ggsegHO 2.0.0

Breaking changes

  • hoCort is now a ggseg_atlas object (from ggseg.formats) containing 2D data. This is a 2D-only atlas (no 3D mesh data available).

  • Use ggplot() + ggseg::geom_brain(atlas = hoCort) for 2D plots.

  • ggseg.formats is now a hard dependency (in Depends).

  • Package URLs updated from LCBC-UiO to ggseg GitHub organisation.

ggsegHO 1.0.02

  • updated atlases to work with ggseg >= 1.6.0

ggsegHO 1.0.01

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.

On this page
